price: Na hakuna chochote ila asili yake inatokana na Sisi; wala hatukiteremshi ila kwa kipimo maalumu.
arabic: وَإِن مِّن شَيۡءٍ إِلَّا عِندَنَا خَزَآئِنُهُۥ وَمَا نُنَزِّلُهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِقَدَرٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ
footnotes: Na hapana chochote cha kheri ila kiko kwetu kama mahodhi yaliyo jaa, nasi tunakiweka tayari na tunakitoa kwa wakati wake. Na hatuwateremshii waja wetu ila kwa kiasi maalumu, kwa mujibu tunavyo pima kwa hikima yetu ya maumbile.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-in min shayin illā ʿindanā khazāinuhu wamā nunazziluhu illā biqadarin maʿlūmin
